description.ko: 암석, 토양 및 광물 매장층을 통해 지구의 역사를 상세히 연구한 작품입니다.
description.en: A detailed study of the Earth's history through its layers of rock, soil, and mineral deposits.

prompt: A macro-topographic cross-section of a desert cliff, revealing jagged layers of #8B4513 obsidian, #D2691E red clay, and #F4A460 crystalline sand. Detailed textures of parched soil and sediment layers carved by eons of geological pressure. 8k resolution, hyper-realistic, side lighting from the golden hour creating deep shadows across #2F4F4F bedrock. A narrative of the land carved by time in stone.
